description: In this week’s newsletter: In retiring his messianic action hero schtick, a return to challenging, messy roles could lead to a late-era flowering of his career

title: Arts Council England chair says sector at ‘tipping point’ amid funding fears
description: Sir Nicholas Serota says continued public investment is vital to draw in private funding to maintain cultural centres

title: ‘Love, hope, community and resistance’: ACLU to unveil 9,000 sq ft quilt for trans rights
description: Giant quilt with messages of hope for the trans community is now arriving in DC at a particularly troubling time

title: Seth Meyers on Trump corruption: ‘It’s all so brazen’
description: Late-night hosts discuss the president’s many Middle East business deals and his acceptance of a luxury jet from Qatar
